p:
The first two cases have dealt with epidemic cases, where our system started with just two infected hosts, and only 4000 infected vectors. We now consider disease scenarios with far larger initial infected populations. For this case scenario, we keep our canonical choices of C 1 = 510, C 3 = 400, ξ = 0 and σ = 0.5, but we increase our initial value of infected hosts to
